channel.title: Welcome to My Site on My Custom Site
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Site on My Custom Site

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: This is my first blog post on the new site. Getting Started Building a custom Hugo site without themes gives you complete control over the design and functionality. Benefits Full customization No theme dependencies Clean, minimal code Better performance

item.title: Project One
item.description: This is my first project. It demonstrates how individual pages appear in the navigation submenu. Features Feature 1 Feature 2 Feature 3 Description Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

item.title: Project Two
item.description: This is my second project, also appearing in the navigation submenu. Overview This project showcases different capabilities and approaches. Technologies Used Hugo HTML/CSS JavaScript
